seo: Elasticsearch,漏洞检测,CVE-2015-5531,目录遍历,文件读取
summary: 该插件用于检测Elasticsearch <1.6.1版本中是否存在CVE-2015-5531目录遍历与文件读取漏洞，通过创建仓库和快照来验证漏洞是否存在。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect the CVE-2015-5531 directory traversal and file read vulnerability in Elasticsearch versions less than 1.6.1 by creating a repository and snapshot to verify the existence of the vulnerability.
